title: U.S. To Urge Covid-19 Booster Shots
itunes:title: U.S. To Urge Covid-19 Booster Shots
description:
Michael Dowling, CEO at Northwell Health, discusses the U.S. government expected to recommend booster shots eight months after people get their second vaccine dose. Bloomberg Businessweek Editor Joel Weber and Bloomberg News Deals Reporter Scott Deveau talk about how the SPAC boom has created fresh targets for short sellers and activists. Ken Leon, Global Director of Industry and Equity Research at CFRA, breaks down Home Depot earnings. And we Drive to the Close with Charlie Massimo, Senior VP at Wealth Enhancement Group.

Hosts: Tim Stenovec and Kriti Gupta. Producer: Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
